website_summaries.verdict: For owners of larger breeds who need stronger cages, this is the muzzle to consider.
pros: Solid metal cage for medium to large breeds
Comfortable enough for longer uses, such as hiking
cons: Metal cage can cut into dog's skin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice muzzle
customer_reviews.text: The muzzle I received was not the same as pictured. It fits well though so I kept it. My dog likes it much more than his previous muzzle. Much better for warm weather with all that panting room.
customer_reviews.author: K Fish

customer_reviews.title: good product sizing hard to get right
customer_reviews.text: This was a well constructed, heavy duty muzzle. My only complaint is that amazon doesnt have a good sizing chart. Also these freedom muzzle run a bit wide and because of that it didnt fit my border collie, but fit my lab mix. The dogs have the same nose length but width is very different. I would buy this product again but probably from dean and tyler site so there is more sizing help.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: best muzzle for safety and fit.
customer_reviews.text: It works, my dog can pant and drink water. The company staff is helpful in getting the right size, but know that you may need to get the right fit and plan on multiple sizes to try out before you get the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars and two paws up
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely, quality muzzle. The Freedom muzzle will allow your dog to be able to pant, drink, and yawn. It does not force their mouth to stay shut. This makes it a great choice for dogs who are accompanying active owners for anything from hiking to running. My dog had worn another muzzle during a trip a few weeks prior to the weekend we tried the Freedom muzzle. He never attempted to remove the Freedom muzzle or showed any other signs of discomfort- he adapted to wearing it right away. It will be our go-to muzzle whenever we are in an area that unleashed dogs may show up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My high hopes are dashed
customer_reviews.text: It fit quite nicely, but small spots of rust started showing within two weeks, and the strap broke after a month. The dog I use it for is 13 years old and not exactly high strung. She wears it out in the yard if my other dogs, who generally leave her alone, are also outside just to add some extra security. (She gets tired of their loudness and nonsense)
customer_reviews.author: Knox

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: got it for my coonhound mix that is chewing everything she can get her teeth on. She is very active and I expected her to go nuts over having the muzzle on. I was surprised that she did fine with it. The muzzle fits well, the dog has never figured out how to take it off, whenever I put it on her, she just goes to her couch and gets quite. I don't use it more than probably once or twice a week for an hour, but I'm glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Entrepreneur

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very functional. This is the oni ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very functional. This is the oni muzzle I've found that allows a full pant and bark. My only complaint is that the one I got had a Sport Dog logo underneath the Dean & Tyler logo. What's up with that?
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mauser

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - Would Definitely Recommend to Others
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product, and I believe my dog is as well! The sizing video was very useful and helped me order the correct size. Both the leather strap and metal basket seem very durable. Most importantly, it allows my dog ample room to pant, sniff, and get treats and he doesn't mind wearing it (he always tried to pull off or wiggle out of the other muzzles we've tried). He is very reactive to other dogs, so it additionally gives me an added sense of security when we go on walks. With some training we hopefully won't need a muzzle anymore, but until then we are happy to use this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great muzzle!
customer_reviews.text: Great muzzle! My lab mix has issues with hands, doesn't like being touched at all and this muzzle does a great job at scaring people away and protecting those who dare to try petting him! I like the fact that he can pant while wearing it and it doesn't seem to bother him at all! Don't give up your dog because of fear aggression! Buy this muzzle instead and keep your pup and everyone around safe!
customer_reviews.author: thatsonlyme

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fit my Doberman. He's an average sized dog, with an average sized head. However, this did not fit as I had expected. I could not find a good way to fasten and secure the muzzle. It slipped off the back of his head easily, and just didn't fit my needs. Customer service was superb. They refunded my money, no questions asked. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: elan

customer_reviews.title: The best we have used
customer_reviews.text: This fits our German shepherd well. We have 4 other muzzles that were a waste of money. With the Dean&Taylor she runs along on 2 hour horseback rides and is able to breath freely and drink in streams. Worried about her catching it in the woods but so far no problems. We slide strap under her collar and it stays on. The leather did stretch after a few months and we just went to next hole.
customer_reviews.author: trlbrkr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Muzzle!
customer_reviews.text: We got this muzzle to help with cat training while we integrate a new dog into our home, and it has been great! This was our second attempt for sizing - She is a 120 lb Malamute/Rotweiler mix, and we wanted to be sure she had enough room to pant comfortably and take treats whenever she shows good behavior around the cat - This one fit the bill! It's given us great peace of mind during our transition period.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I love it and so does my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this muzzle for my husky who is very protective of his space. I got this one specifically because it looked sturdy enough to survive the day with my dog because of the metal and leather. I've had it for about three or four months now and it is still going strong. I love that my dog can still eat abd drink with it on, and although no muzzle is going to be comfortable, this one seems not to bother him. If I were to ever get a muzzle again I would definitely go for the Dean and Tyler freedom muzzle.
customer_reviews.author: candis

customer_reviews.title: The right size for a 65 pound female American Blue Nose Terrier Pit bull.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, doesn't hurt the dog, just the right size for my 65 pound Pit bull. Use it when we take her to the vet just to be safe, have to remove it so she can give grandpa kisses.
customer_reviews.author: DeployGuy

customer_reviews.title: did what i needed it to do
customer_reviews.text: bought it to prevent my gs from licking the crap out of himself. tried everything from bitter apple to e-collar. Finally got him to stop after using the muzzle for 2 weeks straight. It does have a tendency to fall off so I had to jerry rig it to his collar.
customer_reviews.author: suh84sc

customer_reviews.title: Good, easy to put on muzzle for our small female Pitt Bull.
customer_reviews.text: A little more expensive than some of the other muzzels out there, but works very well. it is very easy to get on/off. Bought the recmomeded size for a small female Pitt Bull and it fit perfectly. Our dog is a small (50 lb) female Red Nose. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Fits even a small female Pit: 55lbs., ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits even a small female Pit: 55lbs., I added a tie wrap from the head strap to the dogs regular collar, so she can't possibly pull it off. Only use this as a last resort after dog repeatedly caused expensive destruction from chewing.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected even for being shipped here in Alaska. My pup loves his new gear.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Would buy another one.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my female pitbull with no issues. Had to train her for it, since I just tried to put it on, and she HATED it. Now, she accepts it, but every once again tries to scratch it off. She can eat and drink without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A LIFESAVER IF YOU HAVE A CRAZY DOG. THIS HAS CHANGED MY LIFE
customer_reviews.author: rlene

customer_reviews.title: Great muzzle
customer_reviews.text: Great Muzzle. You really should call Tyler and Dean and discuss the sizing. Will likely require sending them photos of the dog as well - but that is what it takes... Would you buy a jacket for yourself without knowing the right size? This fits your dogs face, the best fit is required.
customer_reviews.author: J. Massey

customer_reviews.title: DT freedom Wire Basket Muzzle
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product and functional as well. Downside is that measuring and sizing is very difficult. I measured my dog as directed on the DT website at least 5 times to make sure I had it right and the muzzle was still a little short for my dogs snout. I strongly advise ordering a little larger than recommended by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Dean and Tyler DT Freedom Muzzle, Size No. 7 - Collie Male
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my old Flat Coated Retriever who like to eat poo and the grass when it has been freshly cut. He still tries to eat poo/grass but all he can do it smush it into the grass - this muzzle is easily cleaned :-).
customer_reviews.author: Jenwin231

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Very high quality, and fit for even a working dog. My dog got used to it in less that an hour. Now I can take her to the dog park without any accidents, and with a calm heart.
customer_reviews.author: JustinP

customer_reviews.title: Left a scar on both sides of my dogs face
customer_reviews.text: Muzzle cut into both sides of my dogs face and left large scars. Measurements were taken prior to ordering
customer_reviews.author: Wolf Outlet

customer_reviews.title: perfect for hot weather
customer_reviews.text: Our german short-haired point (GSP) doesn't particularly like getting it on, but once it's on he seems ok with it. Keeps him from eating poisonous berries and animal faeces that make him sick...
customer_reviews.author: Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made but too small for my standard doxie. Donated it to a shelter.
customer_reviews.author: wdcharmed

customer_reviews.title: Product is sturdy and fits well
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding customer service from manufacturer. Finding correct fit was tricky but they helped me get it. Product is sturdy and fits well. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: #10 size for Male PitBull - rear a bit tight
customer_reviews.text: The lower rear portion of the muzzle (lower jaw bottom) was a bit tight on each side for my Male American Pit Bull . I stretched the cage a bit and now it seems to be fine. Seems as if may hinder the opening of mouth without some discomfort. Nice quality. slowly getting him used to wearing it. Happy with purchace
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for allowing my dog to go outside and play ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for allowing my dog to go outside and play with other dogs without anyone getting hurt by rough play.
customer_reviews.author: JOE F.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly well designed and built!
customer_reviews.text: This muzzle is a first class product. It fitted perfect on my male boxer. The metallic parts, cushion and strap are all made of very good materials and are superbly designed. I am absolutely satisfied and my dog seems to feel the same.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando K

customer_reviews.title: It's solid. I'm not too worried about it coming ...
customer_reviews.text: It's solid. I'm not too worried about it coming off and definitely not worried about it breaking. It's a little big on my 45-50 pit lab mix in size 21 "female pit" so measure twice.
customer_reviews.author: Matt s

customer_reviews.title: dean and tyler basket muzzle
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived quickly, and in perfect condition. It is a quality product, and very well made. Unfortunately, it did not fit my dog properly even though I did all the measuring that was required. I would have ordered another, but there were none in stock of the next possible size.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have a mastiff who chews every thing that he can find. He is still a puppy but well over 100lbs. This muzzle has fit his muzzle perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Geniece Davis

customer_reviews.title: Freedom Muzzel
customer_reviews.text: I had a good experience purchasing this muzzle, all went well. The muzzle fits very well but I purchased one size up after reading another review, If I had not, the muzzle would have been too short. I also added some extra paddign, as my dog will need to wear it during the day while I'm at work until his surgery wound heals. I have a dalmatian.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: D&T make great muzzles
customer_reviews.text: Dean and Tyler make great muzzles. Sometimes it's hard to get the right fit but this one has plenty of room for panting and drinking. It's the third one I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Christiane Greeley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for our 1.5 year old German Shep female. Fit is perfect and gives her room to breath and drink water.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Muzzle
customer_reviews.text: The Best muzzle I ever had! It's really great for me and my dog (American Sttaford Shire) It fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: simone

customer_reviews.title: Muzzle
customer_reviews.text: This Muzzle is advertised to be suitable for Dachshunds. Well, they are not! I have three Dachshunds and they wouldn't fit anyone. This Muzzle is way too large, Ill designed, heavy for a small dog and just poorly conceived. Furthermore, the leather strap designed for "comfort" goes right over their eyes. Whoever designed this did not have dogs in mind. This is truly deceiving advertising. Having paid over $ 60.00 and waited 3 to 4 weeks and then getting a product completely unusable. Useless is the best term I can come up with
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Spiegel

customer_reviews.title: My Pit Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog can now run in parks without me having to worry about him biting people. Love this product very sturdy and my dog doesn't seem to notice that it is on at all. He can still bark drink water and eat snack with it on.
customer_reviews.author: dragon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT. I have a shar pei/bull terrier mix and it fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren hemry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good muzzle for my pitbull it fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: hana smith

customer_reviews.title: perfect 135 lbs Rotty 14 months old
customer_reviews.text: perfect 135 lbs Rotty 14 months old , fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Natural Handcrafted Soap Company

product_meta.title: Dean and Tyler DT Freedom Muzzle
product_meta.description: Size:Large| Style:German Shepherd FemaleDt freedom muzzle - high quality leather from europe & chrome plated steel basket - size #1 - fits great german shepherd female - made by dean & tyler - snout hight 5.12" - snout width 4.33" - snout length 4.33"
feature_bullets: Made for medium - extra large breeds
Large cage that allows the dog to breath & pant
